meanings.definition: In a manner resembling or characteristic of elves.
meanings.sent1: She moved elvishly through the forest, her steps light and graceful.
meanings.sent2: The elves danced elvishly under the moonlit sky, their movements ethereal and enchanting.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to walk elvishly on its hind legs, attempting to mimic the grace of the elves.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed elvishly through the air, weaving a magical spell around all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of the forest, with colors that shimmered elvishly in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Using or relating to the language or culture of elves.
meanings.sent1: She wore an elvishly embroidered cloak, with intricate designs inspired by elven art.
meanings.sent2: The book was filled with elvishly written scripts, depicting ancient tales of the elven realm.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with elvishly crafted sugar flowers, reminiscent of elven gardens.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had an elvishly melodic quality, enchanting all who heard her sing.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated in an elvishly elegant style, with delicate furniture and ethereal decorations.
